error_messages.network_error: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_messages.connection_timeout_error: The connection timed out. Please try again later.
error_messages.send_timeout_error: The send timed out. Please try again later.
error_messages.receive_timeout_error: The receive timed out. Please try again later.
error_messages.server_error: An unexpected server error occurred. Please try again later.
error_messages.authentication_error: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials and try again.
error_messages.authorization_error: You don't have permission to perform this action.
error_messages.not_found_error: The requested resource was not found.
error_messages.validation_error: The submitted data is invalid. Please check your input and try again.
error_messages.rate_limit_error: You've exceeded the rate limit. Please try again later.
error_messages.bad_request_error: The request was invalid or cannot be served.
error_messages.conflict_error: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
error_messages.service_unavailable: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error_messages.unknown_error: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
error_messages.parsing_error: Unable to process the server response. Please try again later.
error_messages.offline_error: You're currently offline. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error_messages.api_deprecated: This API version is deprecated. Please update your application.
error_messages.maintenance_error: The service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.
error_messages.quota_exceeded: Your API quota has been exceeded. Please try again later or upgrade your plan.
error_messages.bad_certificate_error: The server's certificate is invalid. Please try again later.
error_messages.forbidden_error: Access to the requested resource is forbidden. Please ensure you have proper authorization to perform this action.
